name: Next-Episode.net Green
description: Make net-episode.net green instead of blue. Forums unthemed, everything else should be.
additional_info:
2015-09-12 (update 2):
Had not intended to upload this with ad removing, the code for which is now broken anyway.

2015-09-12:
Updated for the new calander style, I can colorise the month back/foreward buttons now. Also added borders to the day boxes, it's a bit more readable to me that way.

2015-09-05:
Everything I can find, except for the forums, is now themed. I no longer hold premium status so there could well be premium features missed. New screenshot added.

2015-09-04:
Most recent change was to move the days counter on the new watchlist menu to the left hand side, improving readability when the browser window is narrow or when zoomed in on mobile (mobile untested). I beleive I forced a font some time ago in an unreleased change, at a time when font changes affected readability for me. There may have been other changes since I last released an update, most likely to unbreak things with site code changes.

Screenshot unchanged due to laziness, website layout has changed since but the colour scheme changes made by this script remain accurate. However it appears on closer inspection there's some link colours I've missed in the site changes, I'll probably look at updating these sometime in the next week & take a new screenshot.

2014-01-13:
Styled the menu on the settings pages. There is still blue elements throughout the settings themselves, but everything should actually be useable now.

2013-06-01:
Changed all colour values to HSL values and tuned the colours down some.
Re-styled the main header slightly in order to remove embedded images.

2013-05-25:
Added an element I missed, kind of an important one too.
